metadata.title: USN-7040-1 -- ConfigObj vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that ConfigObj contains regex that is susceptible to catastrophic backtracking. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a regular expression denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7040-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-configobj - 5.0.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm1 python-configobj-doc - 5.0.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm1 python3-configobj - 5.0.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
